Package characters

Class CivCharacter

java.lang.Object
characters.CivCharacter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CivArcher, CivCatapult, CivGuard, CivKnight, CivWarrior
public class CivCharacter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class represents a character in the game and contains all their main attributes.
Author:
Anh Nguyen Phung, Hung Le Ba, Thu Tra, Peter Vo
See Also:
Serialized Form
